text: Patch.com is an American local news and information platform, which is owned by Hale Global. As of January 2022, more than 100 journalists operated around 1,259 news websites, which also have an information component, in 50 U.S. states and Washington, D.C. Patch is operated by Patch Media Corporation. ==References== Category:Websites established in 2007 Category:American news websites
title: Patch (website)
